name: Upload Simulator
description:
Upload Simulator is a game about downloading and uploading files in exchange for credits and reputation. To speed up your progression you can purchase and upgrade your components for even faster connection speed and storage size.

  • Use hack abilities to speed up your journey
  • Collect random artifacts that will grant you huge benefits
  • Research new technologies using the Research Facility
  • Automate your components production with the Manufactory
  • Generate electricty and overclock your components with the Overclocker
  • Prestige for huge benefits
  • Over 60 achievements
